title: Electrical equipment connected to output
fullText:
All electrical equipment connected to the output side of an electricity converter shall be suitable for the voltage, current and frequency of the output of the unit.
NOTES:
1 The values of current-carrying capacity and voltage drop specified in the AS/NZS 3008.1 series are only valid for conductors operating at 50 Hz.
2 For the type of RCD to be used where additional protection is required for circuits or equipment supplied by an electricity converter, refer to Clause 2.6.2.2.
